ChunkText: you can only apply for an ssn after the following: you are physically in the US in f-1 immigration status your sevis immigration record has been activated by isss please note, you cannot begin the process of getting on payroll with your department until you have applied for a social security number.
ContextBefore: applying for a social security number ssn an ssn is required of any individual in order to get paid in the us.
ContextAfter: the delay in applying for an ssn is often an important reason as to why students cannot get paid earlier in their first semester. students with existing ssns may not experience such a drastic delay in their first paycheck. the isss team will help you with the ssn application process.
